name: Flower Flurry
description:
Flower Flurry is a retro-style 2D platformer where you play through 40 different and randomly generated levels collecting flowers as fast as you can while avoiding bees, wasps and spikes. In this sweet and challenging platformer, you'll need to count not only on your platforming skills, but also on your luck, since the number of flowers to collect is also randomly defined per level. Good luck!

> Main features:
- 40 different levels with increasing difficulty;
- Different types of moving and jumping platforms;
- Built-in speedrun timer;
- 3 lives per run with no continues;
- Random number of flowers to collect per level;
- Retro-style graphics.
